title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 309.2 - Authorized leave of absence without pay for medical reasons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 309.2 - Authorized leave of absence without pay for medical reasons

State Regulations

For the purpose of this Part, an authorized leave of absence
without pay for medical reasons is defined as a leave granted by the
appropriate appointing authority for medical reasons for a period not exceeding
two years, which leave may be extended by such authority for an additional
period or periods not exceeding a total of two years. Notes
